title: Fix state.rs unchecked array accesses
description: Line 549: lines[line_idx] can panic when line_idx equals lines.len(). Line 588: lines.last().unwrap() can panic on empty vec. Line 261: underflow in prev_line_len calculation. Use get(), unwrap_or(), and saturating_sub.

logs.msg: Code review identified 3 issues: (1) line 261 underflow in move_up_logical, (2) line 549 unchecked lines[line_idx], (3) line 588 unwrap on potentially empty vec
